## rds-breadcrumbs Readme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                | Type                   | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ----------- |
| `separator` | `separator` | The separator of the Bread Crumbs. Options are: `"chevron"` and `"slash"`. | `"chevron" , "slash"` | `'chevron'` |


### Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                       |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | Used for adding one or more `RdsBreadcrumb`(s) to your `RdsBreadcrumbs` component |


----------------------------------------------
